sense.gloss: in-house, (on) the grounds, (in) the premises, hall, theatre, theater

sdata.j: ↑許可↑↓きょか↓なく↑劇|場↑↓げきじょう↓↑内|↑↓ない↓で↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑撮↑↓と↓ることはできません。
sdata.e: You cannot take a picture in the theater without permission.

sdata.e: Please let me know immediately if you would like to set up an area of the conference room for your products.

sdata.e: The news of the fire in the factory caused a sensation.

sdata.e: A power failure contributed to the confusion in the hall.
